text: ninnalute nathan allahuvan. ar nalukalilayi akasabhumikale srsticcavananavan. pinne avan tanre sinhasanattilupavistanayi. ravinekkeant avan pakaline peatiyunnu. pakalanenkil ravinetteti kutikkunnu. surya- candra-naksatrannaleyellam tanre kalpanakk vidheyamanvidham avan srsticcu. ariyuka: srstikkanum kalpikkanum avannu matraman adhikaram. sarvaleaka sanraksakanaya allahu ere mahatvamullavanan
